text: Bacon is an unincorporated community in Grant County, in the U.S. state of Washington. ==History== A post office called Bacon was established in 1911, and remained in operation until 1916. The name was intended to be humorous, according to local history. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Grant County, Washington Category:Unincorporated communities in Washington (state)
title: Bacon, Washington
